data: Étienne monte à Paris pour faire des études de cinéma à l’université. Il y rencontre Mathias et Jean-Noël qui nourrissent la même passion que lui. Mais l’année qui s’écoule va bousculer leurs illusions…

Étienne comes to Paris to study filmmaking at the Sorbonne. He meets Mathias and Jean-Noël who share his passion for films. But as they spend the year studying, they have to face friendship and love challenges as well as choosing their artistic battles.
